tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Outstanding Doctor! I went to him for the treatment of a dental fracture.  Being a thorough professional,  he diagnosed the issue and treated it with utmost care.  The clinic is hygienic with ultra modern tools and practices. There were frequent check ins by the doctor to know the pain situation and the process of healing. It took me 5 months for the whole treatment and not even once I felt that i should take a second opinion. Hard to find a dentist who can make dental procedures nearly painless.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Very friendly and empathetic. Right from start to end of my journey as a patient, all the doctors involved were very friendly.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I wanted to express my sincere gratitude for the exceptional care I received during my recent visits. His professionalism, gentle approach, and thorough explanation of each procedure made me feel at ease throughout the entire process. It's clear that he genuinely care about his patients, and I'm incredibly grateful for his expertise and kindness. Thank you Dr. Nikhil for making my dental experience a positive one.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank you for your service. I am looking forward to continue treatment and have healthy teeth. Good luck with your dreams!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently had the pleasure of visiting Dr. Nikhil for a dental check-up and was thoroughly impressed. The clinic's ambiance is welcoming and soothing, perfect for anyone who might be nervous about dental visits. Dr. Nikhil stands out for their exceptional patient care. They listened to my concerns with genuine empathy, explained every procedure in detail, and ensured I was comfortable throughout my visit. Their friendly approach, combined with expert dental skills, made my experience very positive. The staff was equally courteous and professional. I highly recommend Dr. Nikhil for anyone seeking a compassionate and skilled dentist.\

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Urban Smiles Dental Clinic for several dental issues that I had been neglecting for quite some time due to my fear of needles and painful procedures. I recently underwent two dental implant procedures at Urban Smiles, and I must say that Dr. Nikhil is undoubtedly the finest dentist in Lower parel,Worli and Prabhadevi area. The clinic is impeccably maintained, creating an environment that alleviates dental anxiety, and the staff is consistently warm and welcoming. Furthermore, appointments are efficiently organized, ensuring minimal to no waiting time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,

context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review: Had RCT's, bridge and filling work done by Dr Nikhil. His work is really top class yet very affordable. He's patient and gentle during every dental procedure and does not have the very common 'hammer n tongs' approach. As a person he willingly explains every procedure and options available, he's cheerful and positive in his approach. I highly recommend him to anyone who needs dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The doctor very patiently explains the problems and the consequences of each problem, both in the short and long run. 

The procedure was very smooth and painless, with doctor being cautious about any symptoms of pain during the process. Every step was explained beforehand and there was absolutely no discomfort.

He is also very attentive about oral hygiene in his patients and stresses on the same, to avoid further dental issues in the future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *********** *** **** ****** **** * **** **** ********. Dr. Nikhil's advice and guidance helped me think through my situation. I thank him for taking my concerns into consideration. His knowledge combined with his excellent communication skills made my Root Canal Treatment sessions painless and easy. I appreciate all of his help.

I visited Dr Nikhil with severe pain in my wisdom tooth which was in very bad condition and being my first extraction i was very scared. Dr Nikhil explained me the process understood my health condition and my fear and my tooth extraction process was painless. he also ensured to recommend me medicines which won't cause harm to my nursing baby. He explained how to take care of my teeth and keep them healthy through hygiene and diet.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I'm visiting my teeth cleaninghe finished cleaning then I'm checking teeth some teeth are remaining to clean I told him to clean my teeth he clean few teeth and regret to clean some teeth I'm very disappointed to his behavior and they charged over amount as per treatment
reply_text:
Hello Mandar
We sincerely regret for your unpleasant experience.

Because several of your teeth were in poor condition we have informed you that scaling and polishing will not improve the shade of your teeth and you'll require capping for the destroyed teeth.

Nevertheless we made every effort to get rid of stains as much as we could.

Regarding the price as we previously mentioned ,you hadn't had your teeth cleaned in a long time meant that they were in pretty bad state, that's why the charges were high.

We greatly value your input,and the areas we need to improve will be addressed.
We appreciate your visit.
Thank you
Regards
Dr Nikhil Ranjan
Urban smiles
